Label: Digital content item license name
Description: The name or title of the license. Mandatory in any <EpubLicense> composite, and repeatable to provide the license name in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <EpubLicenseName>, but must be included in each instance if <EpubLicenseName> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 100 characters</dd>
